title: 怎么自动给钱?
txt_content:
就是我有一个VIP组,怎么让玩家一移动进去就给多少多少钱?
比如VIP给2000元,怎么实现?

replies.author: li62886288
replies.txt_content: 用mycommand做一个复合命令;你输入设定好的命令然后插件同时执行设定好的给钱和给用户组的命令就行了

replies.author: HGK
replies.txt_content:
把VIP的用户组设置在一个出生点
附近用命令方块就什么都解决了

replies.author: syx330679663
replies.txt_content:
vipzero插件可以设置这个功能：  page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B61%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3Dvipzero%26searchoption%5B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
config里面的这段内容能够设置，第五行就是自动给钱
这个功能要用激活码的才有
把其他的不要就删
vip_items: #扩展内容
- vip1,0,264,1,none
- vip1,0,35:3,1,none
- vip1,0,35,1,none
- vip1,0,potion:poison:true:10:1,1,blindness-10:1
- vip1,0,$,1000,none
- vip1,0,xp,10,none
- vip1,0,cmd,say @player Muito bom!
- vip1,0,310-311-312-313,1,protection-4
- vip1,0,msg,Oi @player &3tudo bom&4?
- vip1,0,276,1,sharpness-3-knockback-2-name-&4Legendary @player-desc-&3desc 1-desc-&c@player
